name: Bugger Wars
description:
Bugger Wars (working title) is a game about interstellar conflict. Trapped on Planet Kepler following the demise of the USS Notoriety, Tanner must regroup with his squad in the hope to repel the on-going invasion. 

Currently there is a very early build with placeholder art and placeholder levels. Just to get a feel for the game. The AI is bugged (lol) right now and will be fixed in upcoming updates.
